Name: Burnside Public Library, Local History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Wed and Fri 2-5pm or by appointment; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. General copying services available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Acquisition focus: The recording, preservation and promotion of the history of the City of Burnside. (40% in-house).

About.Major holdings: City of Burnside: Rate records, minutes of meetings 1856- ; Vertical files on aspects of the area's history 1856- (20m). Various private companies: Population directories 1838-1972 (3m). Monograph collection: (25m). Local newspapers 1948-(5m).
